title: Spirit Guard Udyr Disabled?
body: Anyone know what's going on? I bought him today hoping i could play him but i guess i can't; Anyone know when he's going to be enabled again?

replies.body:
Hey MoodswingModz,

You're correct - both SGU and Primal Udyr are disabled atm because of a graphical bug. A fix is being worked on at the moment! I don't have an ETA when it'll be deployed out, but my best *guess* is somewhere between 1-3 days - that isn't a guarantee tho.

-Terra
Ahh okay, Thanks for the quick response.

Wait, you'd disable a skin because of a graphical bug?

What? That doesn't affect gameplay. I think it should just be notified on the client that the skin has a bug, not to just outright prevent people from using it.

> [{quoted}](name=HORSE OF FORCE,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=8fgqJT86,comment-id=00020001,timestamp=2015-01-29T23:22:42.302+0000)
>
> Wait, you'd disable a skin because of a graphical bug?
> 
> What? That doesn't affect gameplay. I think it should just be notified on the client that the skin has a bug, not to just outright prevent people from using it.

I saw a video of it, believe me it was extremely bad. Covered half the screen at one point.

EDIT:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vUw9YucPS4c

Oh. It *is* affecting gameplay, then.

~~I actually want them to keep it anyway.~~
You don't have a very long history on the forums do you?
I say never, udyr is a stupid champion and no-one likes him.
